title: Top Dog Germany – Der beste Hund Deutschlands
overview: In the so-called "Physical Dog Show" extraordinary dogs and their owners are supposed to overcome a special obstacle course. In five preliminary rounds with final qualification, 15 different dogs and their masters and mistresses show that they form the perfect team and master the spectacular obstacles quickly and with flying colors. The fast-paced show will be moderated by the "Ninja Warrior Germany" trio Laura Wontorra, Jan Köppen and Frank Buschmann.
